app.course

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.course.CourseController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    olaholik Object representing a controller working with Course object and its data. Added special annotation RestController to signalize the form of functions. Contains all functions characteristic for RestAPI.

    • Method Detail

      • addCourse

        @PostMapping(value="/courses")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addCourse(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                        java.lang.String username,
                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                        Course course)
        Method to add a specified Course object and assign to the User object. Method can be called by the url via localhost with POST; e.g.: "../courses".
        Parameters:
        username, - type String; required for authorization process.
        Returns:
        response as a HttpStatus if process was finished successfully.

      • deleteCourse

        @DeleteMapping(value="/courses/{courseId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteCourse(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                        java.lang.Long courseId)
        Method to delete specified Course object. Method can be called by the url via localhost with DELETE; e.g.: "../courses/1".
        Parameters:
        username, - type String; required for authorization process.
        courseId, - type Long; required to check if Course object with this courseId exists and to specify which Course object has to be deleted.
        Returns:
        response as a HttpStatus if process was finished successfully.

      • getAllCourses

        @GetMapping(value="/courses")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> getAllCourses(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String username)
        Method to get all objects of Course type, which are assigned to the same User object. Method can be called by the url via localhost with GET: "../courses".
        Parameters:
        username, - type String; required to check authorization in header.
        Returns:
        response as a HttpStatus with required body: list of words >.

      • getCourse

        @GetMapping(value="/courses/{courseId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Course> getCourse(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                          java.lang.Long courseId)
        Method to get a specified Course object from the objects assigned to the User object. Method can be called by the url via localhost with GET: "../courses/1.
        Parameters:
        username, - type String; required for authorization process.
        courseId, - type Long; required to check if Course object with this courseId exists.
        Returns:
        response as a HttpStatus with required body: object Word.

      • updateCourse

        @PutMapping(value="/courses")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateCourse(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                          java.lang.String username,
                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                          Course course)
        Method to update attributes assigned to Course object. Method can be called by the url via localhost with PUT; e.g.: "../courses".
        Parameters:
        username, - type String; required for authorization process.
        Returns:
        response as a HttpStatus if process was finished successfully.
